name: Mine Chess
description:
Ever wanted to play chess with weapons? Well, here you get to play chess with Mines and Shields!! Controls

This game only uses a mouse and the Esc key.

  • Left click:  Select Chess piece || Select & Place Mine/Shield
  • Right click: Move piece || Set Mine/Shield
  • Esc key: Pause game
Description
  • Killing enemy pieces normally or through mines earn you points.
    • Queen: 9 points
    • Rook: 5 points
    • Knight: 3 points
    • Bishop: 3 points
    • Pawn: 1 point
  • Points can be used to buy mines and shields.
    • Mines cost 3 points
    • Shields cost 5 points
  • Additional details
    • Mines are neutral. Stepping on your own mine will kill your piece.
    • Shields can protect a piece from a single mine explosion.
    • Kings cannot step on mines, but instead, see mines around them.
    • The game ends when there is a checkmate.
  • This is a two player game.
Save Function

This game has no save function. You can re-watch a completed match right after the end, but once you go to the menu, you cannot re-watch the match.

Credits
  • Game Assets: Mine Chess Assets
  • Game Design and Programming: Daniel Ope
